mapper.insert: INSERT INTO od_timeline (psize, product_detail_id, order_id, issue_date, state_code) VALUES (#{psize}, #{productDetailId}, #{orderId}, sysdate, #{stateCode})
mapper.select: SELECT odt.issue_date, ods.state FROM od_timeline odt, od_state ods WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND product_detail_id = #{productDetailId} AND psize = #{psize} AND odt.state_code = ods.state_code ORDER BY issue_date
